text: Armand Benjamin Cloete is a South African politician who serves as a permanent delegate to the National Council of Provinces. He took office as an MP on 23 May 2019 and represents the Free State. Cloete is a member of the Freedom Front Plus (FF Plus). ==Biography== He studied at the University of the Free State. He worked for the Democratic Alliance as a Media Liaison Officer before joining the FF Plus. He was elected to the National Council of Provinces following the 2019 South African general election. Cloete was sworn in as an MP on 23 May 2019. He is one of six permanent delegates from the Free State. Cloete is married and resides in Bloemfontein. ==References== ==External links== *Mr Armand Benjamin Cloete – Parliament of South Africa *Armand Benjamin Cloete – People's Assembly *Profile on Linkedin Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Afrikaner people Category:People from Bloemfontein Category:People from the Free State (province) Category:Members of the National Council of Provinces Category:Freedom Front Plus politicians Category:Democratic Alliance (South Africa) politicians Category:University of the Free State alumni
title: Armand Cloete
